citeinfo.origin: Department of Fisheries and Oceans, Institute of Ocean Sciences
citeinfo.title: NODC Ocean Current Drifter Data

descript.abstract:
Parameter surface and subsurface currents
Measurement Details surface currents (almost all from ship drift, plus some GEK data)- includes summaries by area by month; subsurface data (1972-1992) are from SOFAR, RAFOS and ALACE neutrally buoyant floats and are mostly from the North Atlantic.
PSARC_Utility "Limited potential use ""as is"". Potentially, data could be summarized in sub-regions and compared with recent measurements to detect anomalies in open ocean circulation patterns. These data could also be used to validate circulation models"
Improvements nothing appropriate at this time
Base Internet/URL http://www.nodc.noaa.gov
A TCODE project

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
